data.message: All the hate you're getting recently is really fucked up man, at least now you know who your real fans are, to all the people that act like he's gonna be over if your Trump supporting ass is gonna stop liking him, get the fuck over yourself, Eminem made that video to get rid of fans like you. You're only doing him a favour. And this new song of yours is fucking amazing!!!

replies.message: Bitch you’re like 4 years old talking about being a real fan gtfo of here with that bullshit
Lol were you even born when he was popular?
Oh look another person who knows nothing about trump trying to fit in with the crowd.  Original.

Let's see how well his album sells when Trump Supporters don't buy it....there are Trump Supporters of all different race, color, gender and creed. And they support him for the very best reason because he's for the people...continue to be brainwashed like Em has for decades now. I ALWAYS loved Em....then he personally attacked me for no fucking reason...as well as millions of LOVING FANS. Even Trump Haters should see how fucked up that shit is...get your heads out your asses, this country is flourishing under Trump.
Only ppl who like Em are teenagers, drug users, ghetto fucks or ppl living in their parents basements!
He sucks Jesse Horner, he was good when we were teenagers
I think raper can't be a republican
